column2: Purpose:
column3: string
column4: Processing triangulated solid meshes. Analysis & repair of STL files
column6: Code library which provides geometry functionality used for mesh generation and other applications
column7: Interactive mesh creation tool for CFD
column8: MATLAB code for generation of unstructured triangular and tetrahedral meshes.
column9: open-source mesh generation software with CFD applications in mind
column11: Comprehensive object-oriented C++ software package for finite element mesh generation (triangular, quadrilateral, surface, tetrahedral, hexahedral-dominant)
column12: 3D finite element grid generator with a build-in CAD engine and post-processor
column13: MATLAB/Octave based mesh generation and processing toolbox
column14: PDE solver by Finite Element Methods on 1d, 2d, or 3d objects or a 6-d cube
column15: Generating unstructured meshes in 2D (via triangles) and 3D (via tetrahedrals).
column16: Processing and editing of unstructured 3D triangular meshes
column17: A semi-structured multiblock (2 blocks in Z) 2D/3D mesh generator for Hexahedrons and Prisms --wedges of triangular base-- in 3d, and Quads and Tri in 2d thought, mostly for topography-based domains
column19: An Object-Oriented Toolkit for Solving Partial Differential Equations in Complex Geometry
column20: PAMGEN creates hexahedral or quadrilateral (in 2D) finite element meshes of simple shapes (cubes and cylinders) in parallel. When linked to an application as a library, it allows each process of a parallel simulation to generate its finite element domain representation at execution time.
column21: Qhull computes the convex hull, Delaunay triangulation, Voronoi diagram, halfspace intersection about a point, furthest-site Delaunay triangulation, and furthest-site Voronoi diagram
column22: Generating an orthogonal grid within a curved perimeter, suitable for oceanographic modeling
column24: A Quality Tetrahedral Mesh Generator and a 3D Delaunay Triangulator
column25: Two dimensional (2D) fine mesh finite element (FE) grid editing system. Includes constrained Delaunay triangulation, and automated grid resolution changes based on local attributes.
column26: Generation of 2D unstructured, structured, and hybrid meshes about airfoils and circles
column27: Generation of structured smooth and convex grids over irregular regions
column30: Family of general purpose graphical Pre- and Post-Processors for the numerical modeler
column37: A Generic and Versatile Index-Based Data Structure for Polytopal Meshes
